verses.text: \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* whole council \w rose|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* led \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* away \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* subverting \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, \w forbidding|strong="G2967"\w* payment \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w taxes|strong="G5411"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w proclaiming|strong="G3004"\w* \w Himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w King|strong="G3588"\w*.”

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Are|strong="G1510"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w King|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*?” “\w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w so|strong="G1161"\w*,” \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* heard \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* man \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w Galilean|strong="G1057"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* learning \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1510"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w under|strong="G1722"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*’s \w jurisdiction|strong="G1849"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* himself \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w greatly|strong="G3029"\w* pleased. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w wanted|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w long|strong="G2425"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* heard \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w hoping|strong="G1679"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* perform \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w miracle|strong="G4592"\w*.

The Crowd Chooses Barabbas (Matthew 27:15–23; Mark 15:6–11)

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w called|strong="G4779"\w* \w together|strong="G4779"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* rulers, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*,

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w I|strong="G3767"\w* \w will|strong="G3767"\w* \w punish|strong="G3811"\w* Him \w and|strong="G3767"\w* release Him.”\f + \fr 23:16 \ft BYZ and TR include 17 Now Pilate was obligated to release to the people one prisoner at the feast; see Matthew 27:15 and Mark 15:6.\f*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G1161"\w* \w cried|strong="G3588"\w* out \w in|strong="G3004"\w* unison: “Away \w with|strong="G3588"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*! Release Barabbas \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w*!”

(Barabbas \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* imprisoned \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w insurrection|strong="G4714"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w murder|strong="G5408"\w*.)

\w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* kept \w shouting|strong="G2019"\w*, “\w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*! \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*!”

\w A|strong="G1722"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w time|strong="G5154"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w has|strong="G5101"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w*? \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G4160"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* offense worthy \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*. \w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w punish|strong="G3811"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* release \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.”

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w insistent|strong="G1945"\w*, demanding \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* clamor \f + \fr 23:23 \ft BYZ and TR include and that of the chief priests.\f* \w prevailed|strong="G2729"\w*.
\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* sentenced \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* demand \w be|strong="G1096"\w* met.

\w As|strong="G1519"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* requested, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* released \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3739"\w* imprisoned \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w insurrection|strong="G4714"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w murder|strong="G5408"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w handed|strong="G3860"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w over|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*. The Crucifixion (Psalms 22:1–31; Matthew 27:32–44; Mark 15:21–32; John 19:16–27)

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* soldiers \w led|strong="G2424"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* away, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w seized|strong="G1949"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cyrene|strong="G2956"\w* \w on|strong="G1949"\w* \w his|strong="G2007"\w* \w way|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* country, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G2007"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w on|strong="G1949"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w carry|strong="G5342"\w* \w behind|strong="G3693"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Look|strong="G2400"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2046"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w barren|strong="G4723"\w* women, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w wombs|strong="G2836"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* \w bore|strong="G1080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w breasts|strong="G3149"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* \w nursed|strong="G5142"\w*!’

\w At|strong="G1909"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G5119"\w* ‘\w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w*, “\w Fall|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w*!” \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w hills|strong="G1015"\w*, “\w Cover|strong="G2572"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w*!”’\f + \fr 23:30 \ft Hosea 10:8\f*

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w men|strong="G3778"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w tree|strong="G3586"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w green|strong="G5200"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w happen|strong="G1096"\w* \w when|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w dry|strong="G3584"\w*?”

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w watching|strong="G2334"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* rulers sneered \w at|strong="G1161"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*,\f + \fr 23:35 \ft See Psalms 22:7.\f* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w*; \w let|strong="G1161"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w Himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Chosen|strong="G1588"\w* \w One|strong="G1438"\w*.”

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w mocked|strong="G1702"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w up|strong="G4374"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w sour|strong="G3690"\w* \w wine|strong="G3690"\w*.\f + \fr 23:36 \ft Or to offer Him wine vinegar\f*
